snippet: The Justice Department announced a final settlement with the oil giant for its role in the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, raising the amount from $18.7 billion.
abstract: Justice Department announces $20.8 billion final settlement with BP for its 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill; settlement was raised from $18.7 billion announced in July.

byline.original: By CORAL DAVENPORT and JOHN SCHWARTZ
byline.contributor: Coral Davenport reported from Washington, and John Schwartz from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Justice Department announced a final settlement with the oil giant for its role in the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill, raising the amount from $18.7 billion.

headline.main: BP Settlement in Gulf Oil Spill Is Raised to $20.8 Billion
headline.print_headline: Settlement in BP Spill Is Raised to Final Sum
